Character.action-points-add-script: CHARACTERagdpcGxheTRlchQLEgtDaGFyYWN0ZXJWMhjHlPEBDA.triggerVariable('CUR_Action Points', {autoValue:1, calculateChange: function(oldVal, newVal) { return oldVal + newVal; } });
Character.action-points-subtract-script: CHARACTERagdpcGxheTRlchQLEgtDaGFyYWN0ZXJWMhjHlPEBDA.triggerVariable('CUR_Action Points', {autoValue:-1, calculateChange: function(oldVal, newVal) { return oldVal + newVal; } });
Character.name: Drizzt Do'Urden

Description.Appearance: Drizzt presents a calm, stoic, quiet exterior. Though physically small, he cuts an intimidating figure dressed mostly in black, with a hunter green cloak. His brilliant, snow-white hair is kept long and straight, and his jet-black skin is surprisingly free of scars. But what most people notice first are his penetrating, violet eyes, unusual for a drow.
Description.Traits: Drizzt is a very serious, outwardly even dour man, whose dark sense of humor is generally only revealed to those closest to him. Though some may feel he’s over-compensating for the reputation of his fellow drow, Drizzt’s sense of honor and justice can not be questioned.
Description.Companions: Drizzt has numerous powerful friends and associates throughout the North, but it’s the Companions of the Hall to whom he is forever linked: the dwarf king Bruenor Battlehammer taught him about honor and family. The barbarian Wulfgar showed him the ways of the tundra and the heart of a true warrior. A halfling rogue named Regis brought out his sense of humor and showed him that it’s all right to enjoy the simple pleasures of life. And Catti-brie taught him the meaning of love.

Build.experience-prompt-script: CHARACTERagdpcGxheTRlchQLEgtDaGFyYWN0ZXJWMhjHlPEBDA.triggerVariable('Experience Points', {requireInt:1, text:'How many XP should be added?', calculateChange: function(oldVal, newVal) { return oldVal + newVal; } });
Build.name: Two-Blade Ranger

Feature.description: Meditate aware 4 hours instead of sleep.
Feature.name: Trance (Drow)

Feature.description: Use either cloud of darkness or darkfire once per encounter.
Feature.name: Lolthtouched

Feature.description: Your origin is fey, not natural
Feature.name: Fey Origin

Feature.description: Choose Archer Fighting Style or Two-Blade Fighting Style.
Feature.name: Fighting Style

Feature.description: Wield one-handed weapon as off-hand weapon; gain Toughness as a bonus feat.
Feature.name: Two-Blade Fighting Style

Feature.description: Minor action, designate nearest enemy you see as quarry; deal extra damage to quarry once per round.
Feature.name: Hunter's Quarry

Feature.description: If no allies are closer to target than you, get +1 on ranged attacks against that target.
Feature.name: Prime Shot

Feature.description: Spend action point to make melee basic attacks with primary and offhand weapon; add Wis mod to damage
Feature.name: Dual-Blade Action

Feature.description: If using two melee weapons and you hit twice on your turn, gain +2 to AC and Reflex unti start of your next turn.
Feature.name: Dancing Defense

Feature.description: With two melee weapons, gain +1 to melee damage rolls and AC
Feature.name: Cutting Steps

Feature.description: Spend a healing surge when you reduce a demon or spider creature to 0 hp.
Feature.name: Sacred Duty

Health.death-saves-add-script: CHARACTERagdpcGxheTRlchQLEgtDaGFyYWN0ZXJWMhjHlPEBDA.triggerVariable('CUR_Death Saves', {autoValue:1, calculateChange: function(oldVal, newVal) { return oldVal + newVal; } });
Health.death-saves-subtract-script: CHARACTERagdpcGxheTRlchQLEgtDaGFyYWN0ZXJWMhjHlPEBDA.triggerVariable('CUR_Death Saves', {autoValue:-1, calculateChange: function(oldVal, newVal) { return oldVal + newVal; } });
Health.tempHP-prompt-script: CHARACTERagdpcGxheTRlchQLEgtDaGFyYWN0ZXJWMhjHlPEBDA.triggerVariable('CUR_TempHP', {requireInt:1, min:0, text:'Set to how many temporary HP?' });

MaxHitPoints.heal-prompt-script: CHARACTERagdpcGxheTRlchQLEgtDaGFyYWN0ZXJWMhjHlPEBDA.triggerVariable('CUR_HitPoints', {requireInt:1, min:1, text:'How many HP should be added?', calculateChange: function(oldVal, newVal) { return Math.max(0,oldVal) + newVal; } });

MaxSurges.add-script: CHARACTERagdpcGxheTRlchQLEgtDaGFyYWN0ZXJWMhjHlPEBDA.triggerVariable('CUR_Surges', {autoValue:1, calculateChange: function(oldVal, newVal) { return oldVal + newVal; } });
MaxSurges.subtract-script: CHARACTERagdpcGxheTRlchQLEgtDaGFyYWN0ZXJWMhjHlPEBDA.triggerVariable('CUR_Surges', {autoValue:-1, calculateChange: function(oldVal, newVal) { return oldVal + newVal; } });

Power.name: Second Wind
Power.use-script: CHARACTERagdpcGxheTRlchQLEgtDaGFyYWN0ZXJWMhjHlPEBDA.triggerVariable('USAGE_SecondWind', { isBoolean:1, useRequires: function() { return CHARACTERagdpcGxheTRlchQLEgtDaGFyYWN0ZXJWMhjHlPEBDA.namesToVariables['CUR_Surges'].get() > 0; }, noUseMessage: 'Second Wind requires a healing surge, and you have none.' });

+3d8 to damage once per round (Hunter's Quarry) - ?
+2 to damage rolls against creatures with the spider keyword - Drow Heretic
+3d8 to damage once per round (Hunter's Quarry) - ?
+2 to damage rolls against creatures with the spider keyword - Drow Heretic

Weapon.name: Twinkle

Weapon.defense: AC. Alternate main and off-hand weapon attacks until you miss or until you make five attacks .As soon as an attack misses, this power ends.

Weapon.name: Twinkle

Feat.description: Gain 5 additional hit points per tier
Feat.name: Toughness

Feat.description: Shift as a free action after scoring a critical hit
Feat.name: Agile Hunter

Feat.description: Hunter's Quarry damage dice increase to d8s
Feat.name: Lethal Hunter

Feat.description: +1 damage while holding a melee weapon in each hand
Feat.name: Two-Weapon Fighting

Feat.description: No combat advantage when surprised, +2 to Perception
Feat.name: Alertness

Feat.description: Use at-will power with opportunity attack
Feat.name: Heavy Blade Opportunity

Feat.description: Critical hit with main weapon grants free attack with off-hand weapon
Feat.name: Two-Weapon Opening

Feat.description: Wielding two weapons against foe granting combat advantage, primary weapon gains the brutal 1 property
Feat.name: Two-Weapon Ambush

Feat.description: Deal Dex modifier damage on miss
Feat.name: Scimitar Dance

Feat.description: Adjacent creatures aren't concealed or invisible to you
Feat.name: Blind-Fight

Loot.carried-ad-add-script: CHARACTERagdpcGxheTRlchQLEgtDaGFyYWN0ZXJWMhjHlPEBDA.triggerVariable('CUR_carriedad', {min:1, requireInt:1, text:'How many Astral Diamonds should be added?', calculateChange: function(oldVal, newVal) { return oldVal + newVal; } });
